content: according to the pattern you will work 2 full repeats in row and making the increases each odd round after the m2 r43 k2 work 16 sts using the pattern k4 remove m2 place next 10 sts on a piece of the waste yarn k18 © anna zhuravleva 2020 for personal use only page 3 hand both mitts starting r44 - work up until the desired length knit 2 rounds plain finish with 5 rounds of 1*1 rib bind off in pattern thumb both mitts put the 10 st on the waste yarn back on the needles pick up 4 more sts in the gap 14 sts in total knit in stockinette until the desired length then 3-4 rounds of 1*1 rib bind off in pattern finishing weave in all ends and block *** you can refer to the videos below in russian but you can watch with the sound off how to pick up sts https //youtu be/2gpep3dbbfu how to weave ends - https //youtu be/tctvvl6hoi8 thank you for choosing maze mitts pattern ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/anna-zhuravleva you can match your project to the maze mitts pattern instagram @annikecraft knit you can share with tag #annike_maze_set © anna zhuravleva 2020 for personal use only page 4
